review: this is an amazing product.  it works exactly as expected, we now have 3 of these throughout the entire house.
author: Jarod Rishe

review: It's just a gadget, that's all... not going to revolutionize your living room. After a while I realized that could be better... but for now, for 35 bucks, Its a gadget that im enjoying.
author: Lucas Ogasawara

review: What gives Amazon? If you'd write an app for this like Netflix, I could finally watch my instant video on my television.
author: S. FitzGerald "Skroo"

review: The Chromecast was a little difficult to install, mainly because our Internet speed is so poor in Central Kansas. But it works great now!
author: Maura Wiebe

review: It as it say that it easy to in stilling  on your TV I say get one for your home try it now
author: Dexter John

review: It gave my old TV set a new life, allowing it to access internet, including NetFlix, that was my desire. You can also browse your PC with Chrome and show it on TV screen. Great, for a good price.
author: Paulo Morais

review: I love this little dongle. I like to have the tv on when I go to sleep, and generally that's all I do - watch it til I drop off. Saves me the monthly cost of an extra outlet!
author: Howza "CPH"

review: I love this, I just wish I could do even more with it. Great product for the money. I would buy again.
author: jackie

review: Delivered In A Timely Matter...I Use This To Stream Netflix And Youtube Videos To My TV From My Cellphone And Laptop And The Images Are Clearer Than My Regular TV Cable Channels.
author: dshep1

review: Easy to install. Easy to set up. Easy to use. Changes easily from television to television. Recommend for anyone. Will be buying them as affordable gifts.
author: Linda R. Mcconnell
